creator: Higher Education Strategy Associates
title: 1.14: Colombian Higher Education
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: On this episode of the World of Higher Education Podcast, Javier Botero joins us to discuss Colombian higher education. These days he's a lead consultant at the World Bank, but formerly he was the Vice Minister of Higher Education in Columbia, and he's here with us today to provide an overview of recent policy developments in the nation.
